title: Himi 396
lyrics:
6.6.6.6.4.4.4.4.
1.
Tu’u hoku ‘atamai,
Tu’u mo e fiefia;
‘O hanga ‘o si’ak
i
Ho ngaahi ilifia:
He ‘oku tu’u ‘a e Moihu
Ke fotufotuaki au.
2.
Kuo ne tu’u mei mu’a
He ‘ao he Tamai;
‘O fakamanatua
He toto ne hua’i;
‘O hangahanga fakahā
Ma’aku hono ngaahi tā.
3.
‘Oku ne fakahā
‘A e nima ne touia;
‘Oku kei tulutā
‘A e vakavaka ia;
‘O fai pe hoku fak
a
laloa
He ngaahi matakafo na.
4.
‘Afio he Tamai
‘A ‘ene fa’a hūfia.
‘Oku fu’u ngaue ai
‘A e finangalo ia.
‘O fakafisi fēfē ai!
Ko hono ‘Alo ‘oku fai.
5.
Tala he Laumālie,
Ko e lotu kuo tal
i
;
Pea u ongo’i ē
‘I hoku ‘atamai,
Ku
o
fakamolemole au,
Kuo fānau’i au fo’ou.
6.
Tu’u, laumālie, tu’u,
Ta’e ha ilifia.
Kuo ne ohi au,
Ko ‘eku Tamai ia.
Kau hanga hake, ‘o pehē,
“’E Tamai, ‘Apā Tamai ē!” *
